column5: hey guys,  really itching to fish on the opener in some stretches of river that arent open year round...however i looked at the forecast and rain tommorow!  Do you guys think that 1-3 mm will make the rivers too high and muddy to fish, or not?  How much rain does it take to make the rivers too muddy?  Thanks,  Mike
really depends on the river mike.  but 1-3mm is nothing!  if anything, it'll make the conditions that much better!
